title: Eminence Organic Skincare. Pear & Poppy Seed Microderm Polisher 2.0 oz.
description: An intense microderm skin polisher formulated with antioxidant pear comprising bioflavonoids and hydroxycinnamic acids contains poppy seed and fine walnut to offer mild exfoliation loaded with antioxidant green tea, rich in phenol and vitamin c to rejuvenate skin infused with apricot kernel oil for softening and soothing benefits skin appears smoother, younger looking in an even tone ideal for all skin types, including dry, uneven and congested skin.
